Analyst Vista Consulting Group Austin TX August 2015 to Present In my role at Vista Consulting Group and its parent company Vista Equity Partners my responsibilities are to administer the Security Program and provide Security Consulting for Vistas portfolio of companies The duties include the following Deploy and Operate telemetry solutions that provide visibility to systems users and application behaviors in order to thwart anomalistic activity Maintain Cybersecurity annual objectives and metrics for the firms Cybersecurity Program and policy maintenance attesting to the NIST CSF Conduct ThirdParty Cybersecurity Due Diligence on potential firm vendors Develop best practices that will be implemented and leveraged across the firm and portfolio Provide Tier 23 incident response and remediation for discovered vulnerabilities Analyze Threat Feeds to extract threat intelligence for Firm and Portfolio use Develop and execute Security Education material for the firm and the portfolio Provide consultative guidance to portfolio companies as they build and operate their programs IT Security Intern THE FEDERAL HOME LOAN BANK Reston VA May 2014 to August 2014 Created a provisioning manual for the Office of Finance by conducting numerous interviews with current staff and reviewing prior documentation in order to streamline the process Audited current provisioning process outcomes for adherence to policy and to ensure federal compliance in preparation for a federal audit Education Bachelor of Business Administration in Information Systems THE GEORGE WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY School of Business Washington DC May 2015 Skills Incident Management 2 years Policy Development 2 years Consulting 2 years Vendor Management 2 years CertificationsLicenses CAPM July 2015 Additional Information Threat Hunting Workshops Threat Intelligence Workshops
